Theodore Roosevelt Fredricks

  1. Foster Name: Theodore
  2. Foster Family: Fred and Mary Lessman
  3. Location of Family: Dixon County, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Wakefield, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 2
  7. Date of Birth: 1899-08-01, Manhattan, NY
  8. Date of Death: 1979-XX-XX, Wayne
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: 1920 United States Federal Census; 1910 United States Federal Census; Lloyd Castner Corres.; 1930 United States Federal Census; National Orphan Train Complex; Find-A-Grave for Theodore R. Lessman.
